app.name: StudioPay
orders.title: Bookings List
orders.table.title: Session Title
orders.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this booking?
calendar.title: Calendar
clients.title: Clients
clients.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this client? All of their bookings will also be deleted.
add_client.form.name: Name
pin_lock.title: Trial Period Ended
pin_lock.description: Your 7-day trial has expired. To continue using the app, please send the Device ID to the admin to get your permanent activation code.
pin_lock.contact_msg: Send ID & Screenshot via WhatsApp or Facebook:
pin_lock.incorrect_pin: Incorrect activation code. Please try again.
pin_lock.screenshot_hint: Please take a screenshot of this screen or copy the ID and send it to us.
login.title: Welcome to StudioPay
login.description: Please enter your name to get started and keep your data safe.
settings.title: Settings
settings.trial_desc: App will lock automatically after trial expires.
settings.export_desc: Download a file containing all your data (clients and bookings). Use this to move data to the app.
settings.import_desc: Restore data from a backup file.
settings.error_import: Error importing file. Please check the file.
settings.download_generator_desc: For personal use only. Download the generator to use outside the app.
settings.reset_desc: Delete all data and start fresh.
settings.reset_confirm: Are you absolutely sure? Everything will be deleted and cannot be undone.
settings.simulate_expiry_desc: Lock the app immediately to test the screen.
settings.simulate_expiry_confirm: The app will lock immediately. You will need the generator to unlock it. Proceed?
settings.notification_desc: You will be reminded of upcoming bookings by the number of hours set above.
settings.support_desc: In case of any issues, contact us via:
ai_generator.title: AI Idea Generator
ai_ideas.title: Creative Photoshoot Ideas
ai_ideas.description: Use AI to generate fresh ideas for your upcoming photoshoots.
ai_generator.prompt_placeholder: Describe session type (e.g. Wedding, Product, Kids...)
map_picker.title: Pick Location
map_picker.no_api_key: Map API Key missing. Please set it in Settings.
map_picker.geolocation_error: Could not get your location. Please check browser permissions.
security.title: App Lock
security.desc_biometric: Use device lock to secure the app.
security.not_supported: Your device does not support biometric authentication for this browser.
